data.name: Sample - Fidelis EDR - 1.0.0
data.description: Fidelis Endpoint EDR detects endpoint activity in real time and retrospectively so you can accelerate your response and stop adversaries at the point of entry. This connector supports following actions Get Alerts, Get Endpoints, Detete Endpoints, etc

workflows.name: Get Playbooks And Scripts
workflows.description: Get details of Fidelis Playbooks and Scripts from the Fidelis Endpoint EDR server

arguments.title: Fidelis EDR: Get Playbooks And Scripts

workflows.name: Get Endpoints
workflows.description: Retrieve information about endpoints from the Fidelis Endpoint EDR server.

workflows.name: Get Script Packages Metadata
workflows.description: Get script packages Metadata from the Fidelis Endpoint EDR server based on script ID you have provided.

arguments.title: Fidelis EDR: Get Script Packages Metadata

workflows.name: Get Script Packages File
workflows.description: Get script packages file from the Fidelis Endpoint EDR server based on script ID you have provided.

arguments.title: Fidelis EDR: Get Script Packages File

workflows.name: Execute Script Package
workflows.description: Execute Script Package based on input parameters you have provided

workflows.name: Get Alerts
workflows.description: Get list of alerts from Fidelis based on input parameters you have provided.

workflows.name: Get Playbooks Details
workflows.description: Get playbook details by playbook ID the Fidelis Endpoint EDR server

workflows.name: Get Playbooks
workflows.description: Get list of playbooks and its details from the Fidelis Endpoint EDR server

workflows.name: Delete Endpoint
workflows.description: Delete an endpoint by endpoint ID from the Fidelis Endpoint EDR

workflows.name: Get Script Packages Template
workflows.description: Get Script Package Template from the Fidelis Endpoint EDR server based on script ID you have provided.

arguments.title: Fidelis EDR: Get Script Packages Template

workflows.name: Get Script Job Results
workflows.description: Get Job Results using result ID.

arguments.title: Fidelis EDR: Get Script Job Results

workflows.name: Execute Task
workflows.description: Execute a task (run a script job or a playbook) in the Fidelis Endpoint EDR server.

workflows.name: Get Script Packages Manifest
workflows.description: Get script packages Manifest from the Fidelis Endpoint EDR server based on script ID you have provided.

arguments.title: Fidelis EDR: Get Script Packages Manifest

workflows.name: Get API version Information
workflows.description: Get API version information from Fidelis Endpoint EDR server

arguments.title: Fidelis EDR: Get API version Information

workflows.name: Get Script Packages
workflows.description: Get a list of all script packages from the Fidelis Endpoint EDR server

workflows.name: Get Endpoint By Name
workflows.description: Get IDs of an endpoint based on endpoint name you have provided from the Fidelis Endpoint EDR server

arguments.title: Fidelis EDR: Get Endpoint By Name
